last_episode_to_air.name: The Best of Times
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a series finale that lets Little Mosque on the Prairie live up to itâ€™s namesake, Amaar prepares for the grand opening of the new Mosque, while trying to get Baber to end his boycott. Charles returns to Mercy with a plan to win Ann. Sarah reaffirms her Muslim faith; and, with Mercy Anglican burnt to a crisp, Thorne finds an unexpected new home for his congregation.

name: Little Mosque on the Prairie
overview: The series focuses on the Muslim community in the fictional prairie town of Mercy, Saskatchewan (population 14,000).

episodes.name: Little Mosque
episodes.overview: When a young lawyer from Toronto decides to become an Imam, he decides to move west to the prairies to pursue his true calling. As the new spiritual leader arrives in his new home, the Muslim community butts heads with locals.

episodes.name: The Barrier
episodes.overview: When Baber decides to put up a barrier to separate men and women at the mosque, a war of words along gender lines erupts.

episodes.name: The Open House
episodes.overview: An open house held in Mercy that is meant to bridge gaps between the Muslim and non-Muslim communities has unexpected consequences.

episodes.name: Swimming Upstream
episodes.overview: Rayaan and her mother have an argument over the swimming schedule at the local pool.

episodes.name: The Convert
episodes.overview: The mosque has a new member and this leads to much discussion among the populace of Mercy.

episodes.name: Mother-In-Law
episodes.overview: Yasir's mother arrives for a visit and has plans that could prove disruptive for him and his family.

episodes.name: Playing With Fire
episodes.overview: Rayyan considers dating a local fireman and this proves to be unsettling for a few people.

episodes.name: The Archdeacon Cometh
episodes.overview: With the Anglican church in Mercy facing financial troubles and a visit from the Archdeacon, the Muslim community tries to help out.

episodes.name: Grave Concern
episodes.overview: Baber and Yasir decide to set up a Muslim cemetary but this does not go over well with some in the local community.

episodes.name: Public Access
episodes.overview: Amaar and Rayyan become co-hosts of a public access Islam themed show.

episodes.name: Ban the Burka
episodes.overview: A Burka wearing newcomer stirs up a wide range of emotions in Mercy.

episodes.name: Lucky Day
episodes.overview: Sarah is jubilant when she wins the lottery until she remembers that, as a practicing Muslim, she isn't supposed to gamble.

episodes.name: Mercy Beet
episodes.overview: A local company's stock price rises dramatically and everybody in town wants to take advantage of the opportunity.

episodes.name: Rival Imam
episodes.overview: Amaar has to deal with conflicting emotions when a former friend and now bitter rival comes to Mercy.

episodes.name: Spy Something or Get Out
episodes.overview: The people at the mosque become suspicious when an agent from the Canadian Security Intelligence Service comes to town.

episodes.name: Best Intentions
episodes.overview: Baber starts to rethink his outlook on life when Amaar inadvertently gives him the " evil eye ".

episodes.name: No Fly List
episodes.overview: Amaar and Rayyan go with Baber to the US consulate to get Baber removed from the American " No Fly List ".

episodes.name: The Five Year Plan
episodes.overview: Rayyan decides to add a few yuletide touches to cheer up Sarah, who is openly longing for the traditions of Christmas.

episodes.name: Jihad On Ice
episodes.overview: During preparations for New Year's Eve festivities, many people in Mercy reflect back on what they were doing five years earlier.

episodes.name: The Crush
episodes.overview: Amaar challenges Fred Tupper to a curling showdown though Amaar's knowledge of the sport is rather limited.

episodes.name: Crush
episodes.overview: Amaar thinks Layla has a crush on him and tries to figure out a way of ending it quickly.

episodes.name: Wheat Week
episodes.overview: Sarah looks to replace the " Welcome to Mercy " sign with one written in multiple languages but this proves to be more difficult than she anticipates.

episodes.name: Ear For Trouble
episodes.overview: The mayor tries to have the " Wheat Week " celebration canceled but this move lands her in hot water with the people of Mercy.

episodes.name: Meet J.J.
episodes.overview: During the Ramadan period, Amaar challenges his congregation to abstain from lying, getting angry or gossiping but this proves to be difficult for some.

episodes.name: Security Alert
episodes.overview: A childhood friend of Rayyan's visits Mercy and Rayyan finds herself infatuated.

episodes.name: Security Alert
episodes.overview: J.J. and Rayyan look for a chaperone for their budding relationship.

episodes.name: Marriage Minded
episodes.overview: J.J. seems to be intimidated by Rayaan's dating experience.

episodes.name: Marriage Minded
episodes.overview: After a short courtship, J.J. decides to ask Rayyan to marry him.

episodes.name: Amaar at the Bat
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, we find out whether or not Rayyan accepted JJ's marriage proposal - and what Amaar does about it.

episodes.name: Lord of the Ring
episodes.overview: When Amaar returns to Toronto to re-think his future, Yasir comes to the rescue, only to find that winning Amaar might not be as easy as he thought.

episodes.name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Mercy
episodes.overview: Amaar returns to Mercy to resume his role as Imam but finds he has to reapply for the job.

episodes.name: The Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Layla signs up Baber for an online dating site but soon decides that she must prevent her father from meeting the woman he is matched with.

episodes.name: Rules R Rules
episodes.overview: Yasir hires Amaar to work as a construction assistant but soon realizes that not everybody is qualified to work such a position.

episodes.name: Let Prairie Dogs Lie
episodes.overview: Yasir joins a local lodge to make business contacts but soon realizes that he may be in over his head.

episodes.name: Sweet Sixteen
episodes.overview: Baber enlists Yasir and Sarah's help in planning a party for Layla's sixteenth birthday but Layla isn't keen on the idea.

episodes.name: Mercy Dot Com
episodes.overview: Fatima looks to make a number patrons toting laptops happy at her cafe but risks alienating the rest of her customers in the process.

episodes.name: A Hard Day's Fight
episodes.overview: J.J. is called back to Dubai and this development threatens to cause problems for the relationship between him and Rayyan.

episodes.name: Baber Is From Mars, Vegans Are From Vegus
episodes.overview: Rayyan and Yasir both want to be on Sarah's team in a charity marathon, which leaves Sarah a difficult choice to make.

episodes.name: True Bromance
episodes.overview: Amaar befriends a reporter new to the Mercy area but this friendship is tested when the two wind up in jail.

episodes.name: Double Troubles
episodes.overview: Amaar is enlisted by a friend to go on a double date but finds his confidence somewhat shaken by the outcome.

episodes.name: The Week of Dying Dangerously
episodes.overview: Fred gets some unsettling news from a visit to Rayyan's clinic and decides to change his life radically as a result with his rocky relationship with the local Muslim community the first thing to be changed.

episodes.name: Raised Expectations
episodes.overview: Amaar's attempts to get a raise for himself fail and Fred decides to help him by pursuing the matter on his own.

episodes.name: Colour Me Excited
episodes.overview: JJ tells Rayyan that his parents have bought them a palace in Dubai to live in and the couple try to decide whether to live in Dubai or stay in Mercy.

episodes.name: Recipe for Disaster
episodes.overview: Yasir says he is too busy to attend a marriage workshop with Sarah but soon comes to regret his decision.

episodes.name: My Shariah
episodes.overview: JJ opens an early wedding present but has no idea what the gift is and neither does anybody else.

episodes.name: Baber Makes an Entrance
episodes.overview: Baber insists that the Muslim women enter the mosque through a separate entrance. However, when he has a change of heart, Baber finds it difficult to undo what he has begun.

episodes.name: Meet the Jaffers
episodes.overview: J.J.'s parents arrive for the wedding and J.J.'s mother tells Rayyan something in private and swears Rayyan to secrecy over.

episodes.name: Can I Get a Witness?
episodes.overview: J.J. and Rayyanâ€™s wedding date arrives and chaos threatens to unravel what should be a joyous occasion.

episodes.name: Love Thy Neighbour
episodes.overview: Rev. Magee's replacement wants Amaar and the Muslims out until he realizes his congregates like having the Mosque around.

episodes.name: Big Boys Don't Cry
episodes.overview: When Amaar invites Rev. Thorne to co-host a party, the minister hijacks the planning and almost tanks the event.

episodes.name: What's Yours is Mine
episodes.overview: Amaar thinks Reverend Thorne is stealing his sermons but his idea to prove this threatens to backfire on him.

episodes.name: Break and Enter
episodes.overview: After Rayyan forbids surprise visits, Sarah sneaks into Rayyan's home to get her emergency key and finds herself trapped inside the house.

episodes.name: Death By Chocolate
episodes.overview: Reverend Thorne installs a vending machine during a fundraiser fasting session that Amaar is leading over a thirty hour period. Amaar finds he may have to fight the temptation of easy food with faith.

episodes.name: The Bid
episodes.overview: Yasir is determined to win the bid to renovate the church even if it results in bankrupting him in the process.

episodes.name: Handle with Care
episodes.overview: Yasir accidentally breaks Thorne's statue of Jesus and when he tries to secretly replace it, Yasir receives an unexpected surprise.

episodes.name: Saving Sarah Hamoudi
episodes.overview: Sarah agrees to help Reverend Thorne improve the church's profile in the area. In response, Amaar recruits Nate to help do the same for the mosque.

episodes.name: Gloves Will Keep Us Together
episodes.overview: Thorne tricks Amaar into taking part in a charity boxing match and Amaar finds that if he tries to back out, he might lose face in the community.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Yasir
episodes.overview: Amaar is dumbfounded when he learns Reverend Thorne is faking injuries sustained from the charity boxing match in an effort to make Amaar look bad and generate sympathy for Thorne.

episodes.name: The Great Indoors
episodes.overview: Amaar and Reverend Thorne become lost during a camping trip in the woods. During their struggle to find the way home, the two discover they have more in common than either believed previously.

episodes.name: Pants on Fire
episodes.overview: The Mayor fires Sarah for lying at an inopportune time. Sarah is determined to get her job back and hatches a scheme to do just that.

episodes.name: The Letter
episodes.overview: Amaar accidentally opens a letter meant for Rev. Thorne and learns more about him than he really wanted to know.

episodes.name: Holly Go Quickly
episodes.overview: Rayyan is thrilled when a friend from her days at college comes to visit. However, Rayyan's enthusiasm is dampened when she finds out the real reason her friend is in Mercy.

episodes.name: Radio Silence
episodes.overview: When Thorne encourages Baber to share his extreme views on the radio, Amaar conspires with an unlikely ally to get him off the air.

episodes.name: Keeping the Faith
episodes.overview: Amaar sides with Rayyan in a disagreement with fundamentalists but this decision may be prove to be a costly one for him.

episodes.name: Farewell To Amaars
episodes.overview: Amaar decides to stay in Mercy after he is fired as Imam. Meanwhile, Baber takes over for Amaar as Imam and things go badly very quickly.

episodes.name: A Lease Too Far
episodes.overview: With an archbishop coming for a visit and looking to meet the Muslims in Mercy, Thorne tries to hide the fact that he has evicted the mosque.

episodes.name: The Proposal
episodes.overview: Amaar searches for the perfect way to propose to Rayyan after getting Yasir's permission to marry his daughter. Sarah volunteers to help but soon what is supposed to be the most magical night ever becomes a series of comic misfires. Meanwhile, when Thorne finds the town has turned on him after his bad behaviour toward the Muslims, he tries to find a new way to fit in.

episodes.name: Bromancing the Imam
episodes.overview: Rayyan sets out to convince Amaar that they should have children some day by inviting him to help her babysit a newborn. But when the baby takes to Amaar and not to Rayyan, she's less sure she's in a hurry to become a mother. Meanwhile, Thorne recruits Sarah to help him win over Amaar as a friend but instead ends up destroying a peace offering he had made to the Imam.

episodes.name: Kept Imam
episodes.overview: Amaar becomes self-conscious about his own meagre earnings compared to those of his fiancÃ©e, Rayyan, who is always eager to pick up the cheque and pay for gifts. He decides a pre-nup is the best way to show her he won't be financially dependent on her. Meanwhile, Thorne is wracked with guilt when Sarah discovers he lied to replace her in a community bridge game.

episodes.name: Loose Lips
episodes.overview: Amaar shares personal information about Rayyan.

episodes.name: Roomies
episodes.overview: Thorne sabotages Amaar's housing options to keep him as a permanent roommate.

episodes.name: Smooth Hate Criminal
episodes.overview: Rayyan urges Amaar to befriend a lonely Rev. Thorne but quickly finds herself shut out when the former frenemies find much in common. Meanwhile, when a mishap at the Mosque is misread as a hate crime, Sarah covers for the Mayor until she has to come clean and mend fences between the Anglicans and the Muslims.

episodes.name: Brother, Can You Spare A Mosque?
episodes.overview: The excitement of their first joint purchase is ruined when Rayyan discovers that Amaar heard her snoring as she tried out mattresses. Meanwhile, Sarah, Thorne and Baber try to outdo each other in the charity department when a man down on his luck passes through town.

episodes.name: Every Thorne Has a Rose
episodes.overview: Amaar and Rayyan learn that Rev. Thorne has fallen in love with the local librarian and Rayyan's interfering, against Amaar's advising her to stay away, may sabotage the budding romance.

episodes.name: Love At First Fight
episodes.overview: Urged on by the women of the Mosque, Rayyan runs for the board. But her victory is short-lived when Baber finds a clause in the constitution forbidding women from participating. Worse yet, Amaar agrees to uphold the constitution, no matter how upset Rayyan is. Meanwhile, Thorne enlists Sarah to help him connect with the people of Mercy and she loses her newfound friends to him.

episodes.name: An Arranged Marriage
episodes.overview: When Yasir announces his impending return, Amaar and Rayyan seize the opportunity of his visit to set a wedding date. They soon discover they donâ€™t have time to plan a big wedding and turn the event over to Sarah, who goes over the top with arrangements they don't love. Amaar saves the day when he finds the perfect spot for them to marry. Meanwhile, the only way Thorne can get Baber to help with his tax problem is to convince cranky Fred to do a favour for Baber.

episodes.name: The Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: Rev. Magee arranges an Islamicly appropriate bachelor party for Amaar.

episodes.name: If You Leave Me Now...
episodes.overview: Having mastered his work at the mosque, Amaar has devoted himself to good works volunteering for Islamic Assistance International and is thrilled when they offer him a full-time job. But that joy is tempered with sadness when he realizes the job would take him to Montreal and that Rayyan isn't sure she wants to move. Meanwhile, Sarah and the Mayor become convinced a new doctor in town is trying to steal Rayyan's practice.

episodes.name: Amaar's Well That Ends Well
episodes.overview: Not wanting to cast a pall over their special day, Amaar and Rayyan decide to wait until after the wedding to let their family and friends know they're moving to Montreal. But Baber overhears their juicy news and lets it slip at the worst possible moment. Everyone's shocked reaction threatens to derail the special occasion. Meanwhile, Yasir feels left out and struggles to find his role in the family and in town.

episodes.name: Home Again
episodes.overview: Sarah and Rayyan work at cross purposes to help each other come to terms with Sarah's divorce.

episodes.name: What's in a Name
episodes.overview: When Amaar tries to solve Rayyan's problems at work, he causes her extra stress at home.

episodes.name: Short Fuse
episodes.overview: After blowing out the old fuse box in their house, Amaar tries to impress Rayyan by playing Mr. Handyman but has to secretly enlist Sarahâ€™s do-it-yourself expertise to get the job done. Rayyan becomes suspicious of his sudden upsurge in Mr.-Fix-it skills and volunteers Amaar to fix Fredâ€™s shower, Meanwhile, Baber and Thorne challenge each other to a fasting competition that escalates to insane heights, even for them.

episodes.name: The Dating Game
episodes.overview: Amaar needs Baber and Thorneâ€™s cooperation to win a coveted Multi-Faith Award, but Baber and Thorne try to cut Amaar out when they discover the award comes with a cash prize. Meanwhile, Ann sets Sarah up on the worst first-date of her life, which leads to the worst second-date of her life. And Nate and Fatima team up to make a multi-ethnic sandwich.

episodes.name: Brotherly Love
episodes.overview: Amaar and Rayyanâ€™s first official dinner party as a married couple goes off the rails when Thorneâ€™s brother Charles shows up in Mercy.

episodes.name: Destination Chicken
episodes.overview: Amaar gets a sign from above in the most unexpected, yet fateful manner.

episodes.name: Mosque of Dreams
episodes.overview: Amaar tries to get the town to support his new Mosque, but finds only disinterest and some outright derision when he reveals that his divine inspiration came from a chicken. Meanwhile, Baber is determined to prove the town isnâ€™t ready for a new mosque by trying to get himself arrested. Sarah has a crisis of faith and considers eating bacon, while Ann suffers a crisis of love while sexting the now absent Charles Thorne.

episodes.name: Finders Weepers
episodes.overview: Sarah feels undervalued by Ann and agrees to work for Darnellyâ€™s Mayor, Glenda Beckford, not realizing that Annâ€™s college â€˜frenemyâ€™ has ulterior motives for hiring her. Meanwhile, Amaar is so consumed with his plans for the new Mosque, he manages to forget Rayyanâ€™s birthday. Baber and Thorne compete for clients at the mosque/churchâ€™s last rummage sale.

episodes.name: Haunted Mosque on the Prairie
episodes.overview: When Amaar inadvertently leads everyone to believe that the new Mosque is haunted, Sarah runs damage control and suggests he and Rayyan spend the night in the Mosque to prove itâ€™s completely ghost-free. Meanwhile, a love-struck Nate goes to extreme lengths to ask Poppy out on a date. And Thorne helps Baber overcome his irrational fear of Jinn.

episodes.name: The Worst of Times
episodes.overview: In the lead up to the series finale, Amaar reveals to Baber that he plans to be the Imam of the new Mosque. In turn, Baber revolts and forms a splinter Mosque. Meanwhile, Ann is distraught over Charlesâ€™ upcoming nuptials to a younger woman and comes up with a bizarre strategy to fight for her man. And Sarah attempts to rejoin the church choir, with fiery results.

episodes.name: The Best of Times
episodes.overview: In a series finale that lets Little Mosque on the Prairie live up to itâ€™s namesake, Amaar prepares for the grand opening of the new Mosque, while trying to get Baber to end his boycott. Charles returns to Mercy with a plan to win Ann. Sarah reaffirms her Muslim faith; and, with Mercy Anglican burnt to a crisp, Thorne finds an unexpected new home for his congregation.
